Voter Data Access Guide

Welcome to Urnicus, a comprehensive guide to obtaining voter registration lists and voter history data across all 50 U.S. states.

Get Started

View State-by-State Comparison →

Browse detailed information for each state, including:

  • Access methods (online, mail, email, etc.)
  • Cost information
  • Voter history availability
  • Step-by-step instructions
  • Official links and forms

About This Resource

This research compiles information on how all 50 states make their voter registration lists and voter history available. The goal is to provide helpful breadcrumbs for anyone looking to access this public data.

Whether you’re a researcher, campaign worker, journalist, or interested citizen, this guide will help you navigate the process of obtaining voter data in your state.

For questions or corrections, please reach out through the repository.

urnicus is maintained by urnicus. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
